page.title: 19Archbishop of Canterbury
page.content: {Dr.Robert Runcie}was appointed {Archbishop}of Canterbury by the Queen in 1980. He has many roles within the church: a) He is Bishop of the Diocese of Canterbury. b) he is reponsible for the province of Canterbury. c) He is Primate of all England. d) He is looked on as the spiritual leader of the{Anglican Church} throughout the world, and so many overseas visits are made. He presides over the Lambeth Council which is a meeting of bishops worldwide and is still held in Canterbury. e) He has a seat in the House of Lords. In his spare time he enjoys watching and playing sport and breeding pigs. The{Cathedral}is under the care of the Dean and Chapter.
